name: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features dark/light mode, project showcase, and interactive UI elements.

name: HACX: Portable Iris Authentication
description: Raspberry Pi + React Native device that captures NIR iris scans, runs PyTorch inference via FastAPI, and verifies identities with Hamming-distance checks.

name: Crypto Live Pricing Platform
description: Real-time cryptocurrency dashboard with Node.js REST APIs, React.js charts, and SQL persistence. Dockerized backend streams price ticks and portfolio stats.

name: Command-Line Chatbot
description: Java-based CLI assistant that preserves conversation history with serialized storage and supports task reminders and note taking.

name: Arduino Robot & SLAM
description: Maze-navigation robot powered by Arduino Mega + Raspberry Pi, integrating LiDAR and ROS SLAM for mapping and obstacle avoidance.

name: Famished Fish FPGA Game
description: Custom Verilog game rendered on LED matrix, optimized state machines for smooth controls and low-latency graphics.
